Actions.Name: Abyss Spike
Actions.Description: Create a height 2 Abyss spike object in range. Characters adjacent take 2 damage and are shoved 1. The spike releases an aura 1 of dark energy while it's active. Foes in the aura are weakened, and take 2 damage if they end their turn there.
Actions.Effects: Becomes a free action while bloodied.
